metadata.description: The location in which the data collection rules and data collection endpoints should be deployed.
Enter Microsoft Sentinel Workspace Name of Log Analytics workspace
Enter Azure Client ID that you have created during app registration
Enter Azure Client Secret that you have created during creating the client secret
Enter Azure Tenant ID of your Azure Active Directory
Enter Object id of your Microsoft Entra App
Enter Base URL of Mimecast API 2.0 starting with "https://" followed by hostname (Example: https://api.services.mimecast.com)
Enter Mimecast Client ID for Authentication
Enter Mimecast Client Secret for Authentication
Enter the start date in the 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. If you do not provide a date, data from the last 60 days will be fetched automatically. Ensure that the date is in the past and properly formatted
Enter name of the table used to store TTP Attachment data. Default is 'Ttp_Attachment'
Enter name of the table used to store TTP Impersonation data. Default is 'Ttp_Impersonation'
Enter name of the table used to store TTP Attachment data. Default is 'Ttp_Url'

Enter a valid Quartz Cron-Expression. (Example: 0 0 */1 * * *)

Do not keep the value empty, minimum value is 10 minutes
Add log level or log severity value. Default is 'INFO'

Migrate Classic Application Insights to Log Analytic Workspace which is retiring by 29 Febraury 2024. Use 'Log Analytic Workspace-->Properties' blade having 'Resource ID' property value. This is a fully qualified resourceId which is in format '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/{workspaceName}'
